SEARCH
Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Class LogFormatter.EventFormatter.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogFormatter.EventFormatter.Builder
Enclosing interface:
LogFormatter.EventFormatter
public static final class LogFormatter.EventFormatter.Builder extends Object
Log formatter builder that is composed of other formatters. The add(LogFormatter) are executed in insertion order.
